title: All-New Firefly: The Gospel According to Jayne, Vol. 3
description: All-New Firefly comes to a conclusion that no fan in the ‘verse should dare miss!Jayne drifts in space, isolated except for the company of painful memories, starship debris, and guilt.Meanwhile, a distress call from Requiem greets the crew, hinting at where the relics really came from… where did the monks find them, and what secret Alliance connection do they have? Captain Kaylee is determined to know.Can the crew of the Serenity retake Requiem and defeat the Tax Collector once and for all? What's more, Jayne will go to any length to save his son, but it won’t be enough, as a beloved member of the spaceship Serenity will make the ultimate sacrifice.All-New Firefly comes to a stunning conclusion by writer David Booher (Canto, Joe Hill’s Rain) and artist Simona Di Gianfelice!Collects All-New Firefly #9-10 and All-New Big Damn Finale #1.
author: David M. Booher
